titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Charles Kay Ogden, [Frühjahr 1929 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der ÖNB (Autogr. 1270/42-8); Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Ogden, S. 72).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Sorry I cannot come to you today. Could you come & have tea with me some day next week? (Say Tuesday).
